text: 7|131|Eteke yetiya sihamtara ocarata kono kalyana ahichila, tetiya sihamte kaichila, ‘e'ito amara praapya’. Arau yetiya kono akalyane sparsa karaichila tetiya sihamte mucha arau te'omra sangisakalaka amangala buli ganya karaichila. Saradhana! Sihamtara akalyana kerala allahara niyantranata, kintu sihamtara bahute'i seya najane.
